Fayçal Azizi (Arabic; a mụrụ na 26 Febụwarị 1986 na Tetuan) bụ onye obodo Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu na onye na'ede egwu
A maara ya maka egwu ya "Werda ala Werda" na ihe nkiri afọ 2006 The Bitter Orange, egwu ya na otu K'lma, na nsochi ya afọ 2015 nke egwu ọdịnala Judeo-Moroccan "Hak A Mama".

Fayçal Azizi malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nnabata na Superior School of Dramatic Arts and Cultural Entertainment na Rabat. O mepụtara otu egwu K'lma n'afọ 2004, wee sonye n'òtù Dabateatr n'afọ 2007, na-eme ihe nkiri dị iche iche dịka Il / Houwa na Driss Ksikes's 180 degrés. Ọ pụtakwara dịka Habib na usoro Kaboul Kitchen nke a na-agbasa na ụlọ ọrụ TV French Canal+.
